In this document, we compare prototype 3, with models where the causal effect for BMI, SBP, non-HDL cholesterol and smoking status are 'dropped into' the model.

# Female

```{r, echo = FALSE}
gender <- 2
```

## Convergence plots

```{r}
knitr::include_graphics(paste("../../../figures/p4/convergence_plot_prototype3", gender, ".png", sep = ""))
```

## Density plots

```{r}
knitr::include_graphics(paste("../../../figures/p4/density_plot_prototype3", gender, ".png", sep = ""))
```
